alert.note: Alert for Washington (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 07 at 3:29AM PST until January 08 at 1:51AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Tualatin River near Dilley affecting Washington County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tualatin River near Dilley. * WHEN...From this afternoon to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...Above 17.5 feet, several roads begin to flood and may be closed. Widespread lowland agricultural flooding occurs at this and higher stages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:15 AM PST Friday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above minor flood stage this afternoon and crest near 17.5 feet. The river should then fall below flood stage tonight. - Minor flood stage is 17.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by midday Friday.
